body_html:
A sneak preview:

>>> import tensorflow as tf
>>> import numpy as np
>>> a = [[1., 2.]]
>>> b = [[3., 4., 5.], [6., 7., 8.]]
>>> np_a = np.array(a)
>>> np_b = np.array(b)
>>> np_dot = np_a @ np_b
>>> tf_a = tf.constant(a)
>>> tf_b = tf.constant(b)
>>> tf_dot = tf_a @ tf_b
>>> tfpy_dot = tf_a @ b
>>> pytf_dot = a @ tf_b
>>> tfnp_dot = tf_a @ np_b
>>> nptf_dot = np_a @ tf_b
>>> with tf.Session():
...   print(tf_dot.eval())
...   print(tfpy_dot.eval())
...   print(pytf_dot.eval())
...   print(tfnp_dot.eval())
...   print(nptf_dot.eval())
...   print(np_dot)
... 
[[ 15.  18.  21.]]
[[ 15.  18.  21.]]
[[ 15.  18.  21.]]
[[ 15.  18.  21.]]
[[ 15.  18.  21.]]
[[ 15.  18.  21.]]
body_text:
A sneak preview:
>>> import tensorflow as tf
>>> import numpy as np
>>> a = [[1., 2.]]
>>> b = [[3., 4., 5.], [6., 7., 8.]]
>>> np_a = np.array(a)
>>> np_b = np.array(b)
>>> np_dot = np_a @ np_b
>>> tf_a = tf.constant(a)
>>> tf_b = tf.constant(b)
>>> tf_dot = tf_a @ tf_b
>>> tfpy_dot = tf_a @ b
>>> pytf_dot = a @ tf_b
>>> tfnp_dot = tf_a @ np_b
>>> nptf_dot = np_a @ tf_b
>>> with tf.Session():
...   print(tf_dot.eval())
...   print(tfpy_dot.eval())
...   print(pytf_dot.eval())
...   print(tfnp_dot.eval())
...   print(nptf_dot.eval())
...   print(np_dot)
... 
[[ 15.  18.  21.]]
[[ 15.  18.  21.]]
[[ 15.  18.  21.]]
[[ 15.  18.  21.]]
[[ 15.  18.  21.]]
[[ 15.  18.  21.]]
body:
A sneak preview:
```
>>> import tensorflow as tf
>>> import numpy as np
>>> a = [[1., 2.]]
>>> b = [[3., 4., 5.], [6., 7., 8.]]
>>> np_a = np.array(a)
>>> np_b = np.array(b)
>>> np_dot = np_a @ np_b
>>> tf_a = tf.constant(a)
>>> tf_b = tf.constant(b)
>>> tf_dot = tf_a @ tf_b
>>> tfpy_dot = tf_a @ b
>>> pytf_dot = a @ tf_b
>>> tfnp_dot = tf_a @ np_b
>>> nptf_dot = np_a @ tf_b
>>> with tf.Session():
...   print(tf_dot.eval())
...   print(tfpy_dot.eval())
...   print(pytf_dot.eval())
...   print(tfnp_dot.eval())
...   print(nptf_dot.eval())
...   print(np_dot)
... 
[[ 15.  18.  21.]]
[[ 15.  18.  21.]]
[[ 15.  18.  21.]]
[[ 15.  18.  21.]]
[[ 15.  18.  21.]]
[[ 15.  18.  21.]]
```
